title: Fandom
alt: Ron Paul wants to put the New Republic back on the Corusca gem standard.
transcript:
[Cueball is looking through a box.]
Cueball: Hey, my old Star Wars books![Cueball is holding a pair of books and showing them to Megan.]
Cueball: Man. Timothy Zahn, Michael A. Stackpole, The Corellian Trilogy...
Cueball: This was my world.Megan: What'd you leave it for? Firefly? BSG?
Cueball: Nah.
Cueball: I guess I've just grown out of the whole obsessive fan mindset.Megan: Really.
Megan: So how's Ron Paul doing?
Cueball: Ooh! Lemme recheck today's blogs.
[Cueball drops the books and heads off to recheck the blogs.]
